p: All of the experiments were performed in technical triplicate, and the results represented are the mean of the triplicate with scanning electron microscopy (SEM). Statistical analysis was performed using GraphPad Prism 7.0 software, and the statistical significance was calculated using one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) followed by Dunnettâ€™s multiple comparison test. P < 0.5 was considered statistically significant.
